Key:
*Sigh*... It was worth all this just to see everyone
have so much fun. Even Rinne and Maria looked like
they were enjoying themselves.

(But, it can't be like this forever. There are so many
things we need to think about.)
...Maybe I'll go for a walk.

Come to think of it, when I first met her, it was
around this time.

(Not much time had passed since then. But Maria is
here with me now... That's why it reminds me of her.)

(Marina, a girl who left Maria behind and
disappeared.)

(While I was remembering my time in the virtual world,
I realized I'd arrived at Takadai Park. It's late. Of
course there's no one else around but me.)

...I was only planning to take a stroll around the block,
but I ended up walking further than I thought.

(If I take too long getting back, I might make Rinne
and Maria worry. I should hurry up and go home.)

Should I run...? No, I don't have to do that much.
If I just speed walk...

(Just then, I heard footsteps, even though the park
was supposedly empty.)

(I had hopes. But considering that we were in Eden,
I figured it might be a possibility.)
Hm... Huh?
Huh?

(But when I turned around toward the voice I heard,
the person that was there was...)
(An unfamiliar girl, looking bewildered and innocent.)
A... girl? At a time like this?
Huh...?

(I couldn't explain it, but she had an undeniable
presence. And she seems a bit familiar...)
Wait... Could you be Papa?
What...?
(P-Papa? What is this girl talking about?!)
You're... Papa, right?

W-Wait a minute... I'm Shido Itsuka. I'm a high school
student. It's too soon for me to have a child your
age...
Shido... Itsuka?
That's right! I'm not your papa...
So you are Papa! You're Papa, right?
Sh-She doesn't get it at all...

No, Rio gets it. Shido Itsuka is my papa. Rio's papa's
name.
Me... Papa? Wh-What does that mean?
Papa is Papa, right?
No, so what "Papa" is―
Oh! Rio has to go soon. So I'll let you know.
Uh... Okay.

For everyone to be happy, I have to find the most
important thing.
Huh? What do you mean, the most important thing?
Well, I'll be off! Bye-bye, Papa!
Uh, who are you...?
Rio is... Rio? Rio Sonogami!
Rio... did you say Sonogami...?!
(Like Rinne...?)
...Bye!

(I was dumbfounded by this sudden turn of events,
and this girl named Rio ran off somewhere.)
...W-Wait a minute! Rio! RIO!

(I rushed after her, but just as I thought, she didn't
respond.)
Who was she...
(Her aura was like a Spirit, and her name...)
Rio Sonogami...

(Her last name was the same as Rinne's. So is she
related to Rinne in some way?)

(Come to think of it, she does resemble Rinne a bit.
But she called me Papa. Who was she...?)

Awww. Look at you. So glum, like your happiness just
escaped you.
Huh...?
Why are you so dumbfounded? You forgot about me?
Mari...na? Marina?! You're in this world, too...?!

Yes. I thought I disappeared, but apparently not. My
existence here is an undeniable fact. Unfortunately
for you, you can't get rid of someone that gets in―?!
Don't be like that... I'm so glad to see you again.
Hey, let go of me! I don't like this about you!
...Oh, sorry. I couldn't help it.

Don't you start with me. Gosh, you're so oblivious to
what you're doing, aren't you? Someday, you'll get
arrested.
*Grunt*... I get that a lot.
(Especially from the Ai-Mai-Mii trio.)
What... So you're that happy to see me?
Yeah. I'm happy.
That is annoying...
Wh-What?

Until I talked to you, you were completely in a daze.
But now, here you are, looking all serious and saying
these things to me.
Well um... I don't have any excuses, but...

Well, I don't blame you. You met such an adorable
girl. Right, Papa?
Marina, you saw?

Well, yeah. I was watching the whole thing. And
besides, I know her more than you.
H-How do you know so much?
Hmm, I wonder...?

You know what... Wait, before we go there, can you
tell me who she is...?

Hmm. Well, she's looking for something. She said so
herself, didn't she?

Ah, she did. She said... it was the most important
thing, right?
Yes, that's right. But I can't say any more than that.
Marina, do you know something about this world?

Hmm... I do. At least more than you do. Of course,
I'm not the type of girl who'll just give it up when
you ask.

(...She hasn't changed a bit. But I found her way of
speaking nostalgic in a way.)

...Well, then I'm not going to ask you now. What do you
plan on doing from here?
Me?

Yeah. It's not like you're going to come to Maria's,
right?
Hmm... I decided to help her.
Help Rio?

That's right. I can't just leave her be. I feel like I'm
watching over a little sister. She's such a good girl.
Unlike Maria.
I see... Isn't that nice.

What? What are you talking about? I'm just helping
her because I'm bored.
Gosh, you really are something...

Well, I'll be on my way. I'm sure Rio is waiting for me,
and you have to go home too, don't you?
Yeah. Then, can I say one thing before we leave?

What is it? If you ask me anything suspicious, I'll
report you to the police.

That outfit is cute. I've never seen you in normal
clothes, so it's really new to me.
What...?! Are you an idiot?!
...That hurts?! Don't throw rocks at me!
Shut up! Gosh, when you compliment me like that....
Then what?

Why didn't you compliment me in the beginning? And
you call yourself a ladies' man...
I don't remember becoming one! But sorry...

(I just messed up with Maria by talking about her
clothes.)

Gosh, I'm starting to feel... whatever. Later, Shido
Itsuka.
Yeah. Later, Marina.

(Marina should have disappeared, but I was able to see
her again. And I have a feeling I'll see her again
sometime soon. She did say, Later.")"

In the end, there are so many things I can't figure
out. In fact, I feel like even more mysteries are
piling on.
(But I did learn one thing.)
Marina changed...

(Marina is... probably the same Marina before she
disappeared. She hasn't forgotten the kindness of
saving her little sister. That made me so happy.)

Welcome home, Shido. You're pretty late. Did you
walk far?

Rinne, you see through everything... Yeah, I started
to walk and lost track of time.

(I should keep my meeting with Rio and Marina a
secret for now. I still don't know what's going on as
it is. I don't want to worry Rinne even more.)
...What's the matter? Did something happen?
Oh, nothing. I was just thinking.
Wait, about this world―
No, no! It's seriously not a big deal.

Are you sure? You shouldn't think too hard on your
own, okay? I'll always be here to listen to you.
Yeah, I know. So, where are Tohka and the others?

We were chatting till pretty late, but they just went
back to their houses. Kotori-chan and the others took
a bath and went to bed.
I see. Thanks for taking care of everyone, Rinne.
No problem at all. I'm going to go home now.
Okay, got it Rinne. Good night.
Yeah. Good night, Shido... I'll see you tomorrow.
Yeah, tomorrow.

(This world... A new Eden... What is it for? The same
world Rinne created, but it's not by Rinne. Maria and
Marina are here, too. This shouldn't be happening.)

(Rio... I wonder if that girl knows the secret to this
world. There's no proof, but...)
The most important thing...

(What could it be? Does it pertain to me? Or her?
I don't even know where to start.)
If it's something important for me...

(Then I thought about the little bag. I thought I saw
it recently...)
...It can't be.

(I shouldn't think too much. I'll sleep it off, clear my
head, and try again in the morning.)
(And then I closed my eyes.)
